name: SoundBurner
description:
Welcome to the SoundBurner project!

Just a small prototype for an action-runner, which I decided to release with some tweaks to make it a contemplative experience.

Just have fun listening to your favorite tunes while running/flying at 88mph!

And if you're interested, know that this project is in dire need of a 3D artist and a sound designer. Just sayin'.

Well that's all. Have fun playing!
